title: What\'s the occupancy rate of the homes and apartments at Jervay Place on Dawson Street? I drive past there every day and many of the apartments appear vacant and I rarely see cars in the parking lots. Wasn\'t the Wilmington Housing Authority going to make those places available to the needy? Seems to be a waste of tax dollars to have homeless people filling publicly-funded shelters and have all these vacant buildings collect dust.
